website_summaries.verdict: The perfect fit for a modern home or apartment that needs a small, sturdy bookcase that can be folded away when necessary.
pros: Stylish industrial metal and wood design
Sturdy frame that won't collapse or wobble, even when full of heavy books
cons: It is smaller than some users were expecting, so it's not ideal if you have a lot of books

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookshelf! It is the perfect height for my home office! Very sturdy shelves. Deep to hold a big printer on it too! Easy to assemble with no tools needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! It was the perfect size for all my books and didn’t take up a lot of space! It was SOOOOO easy to put together! I’m also usually very picky about stuff trying to look like wood because I usually want real wood but the shelf’s don’t look bad at all! As you can see in the picture I also have the matching desk. The metal was in good shape too and didn’t feel cheap at all! And both are very sturdy! If you need small office furniture I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: bcrosslin

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful book shelf- however it is a lot smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful book shelf- however it is a lot smaller than the pictures make it look. Great quality and easy set up though!!! We are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: SO IMPRESSED! It looks amazing, holds all my books, seems really sturdy, and was ridiculously easy to "assemble". You can not beat this for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Patron

customer_reviews.title: The easier thing I’ve ever assembled.
customer_reviews.text: It literally took five minutes. I plan on purchasing more for the aesthetics. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Still just a broken piece
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I have to say that this shelf looks nice. It was easy to put together....or try to put together. My shelf arrived with the plastic clamps being shattered. This seems to be a major flaw in this shelf, as these flimsy plastic clamps are what hold your shelf together. I did contact customer service, but after going back and forth, and months of being told I'd get replacement parts, I still have a frame of a shelf and the wooden boards just sitting next to it. It's a shame I can't return this.
customer_reviews.author: goodorbad

customer_reviews.title: The Easiest Assembly EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shelving unit. I was a little unsure about the color as most of my 'real wood' is warm tones, but it worked out perfectly. It is not real wood and the tones are more brown/gray, but you literally open the box, unwrap, stand up the unit and snap on the shelves. A 3 year old could do it! It's not too heavy, but very sturdy as I'm using it for my books and plants in the kitchen. This will continue to have use throughout my home. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LoveCuban73

customer_reviews.title: Highest recommendation!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happy! It is great looking, a cool mix of materials, and is holding everything perfectly. It is solid, made of quality materials, well manufactured, and, because of it's clever design, only takes moments to put together. Seriously, this is better than expected and well, well worth the price. We are now looking through their other products for what is next to buy from them we are so pleased. (Sorry-- no matter how I position photos they always come out sideways on Amazon)
customer_reviews.author: brian mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I needed. Easy to put together, very sturdy, and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a place to store my books that didn’t take up a lot of space. These shelves are perfect. Very easy to set up (took maybe 5 minutes for each). They are sturdy and nice to look at...not too tall. I’ll buy more when I add more books to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Teller

customer_reviews.title: Great little bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase arrived in perfect shape, and was super easy to put up in my room. My only problem now is that I wish it was about 2 shelves taller - I filled it up too fast! :) On the plus side, I was able to shelve my books 2-deep on each shelf. One con: it doesn't come with hardware to bolt it to a wall for safety. But a lot/most bookcases don't, so I didn't take any stars away. It would just be nice. :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, except the clips don't actually clip. The shelf seems sturdy enough otherwise, but at certain angles you can see that the clips aren't clipped in. I bought this shelf to put a printer and binders/books for school. I wasn't sure if there would be enough height between the shelves but the heigh is perfect for binders and books. It also matches the desk I bought at Aldi's perfectly; I wasn't looking to spend this much originally on a shelf, but I didn't have to build it and it matches the desk I bought. Not the nicest looking piece of furniture but it works well and looks pretty nice for my college apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love this book shelf!
customer_reviews.text: This is great!! the reviews were right on. I love the look of this shelf, the sturdiness AND the fact that it just unfolds and the shelves snap on. I really like everything about it. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. The shelves just snap in place. We put together in less than 10 minutes from opening the box to installing shelves and putting in the corner. I totally recommend this product. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Mormon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This goes together extremely easy! This one is in my media room and it’s got enough space as you can see! I love it so much I bought another one for books and plan to buy a third as my book collection grows. Love this little shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product. Took less than 10 minutes to put the shelves on and the whole piece is very sturdy. Great buy for the price and packaging was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: i want to buy 3 more !!!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a gift for my sister and her boyfriend, and it was ana amazing idea!! shipping was fast and since this item is prime eligible, it was free !!! assembly took less than 10 minutes and that includes unboxing all the parts. the iron frame is sturdy and looks amazing. the shelves, which clip onto the metal frame, are amazing quality and will definitely stand up to the task you give them. it’s a very high quality piece that i would recommend to anyone looking for a functional, no assembly bookcase !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks good, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This took me maybe 5 minutes to put together. It looks nice and a lot more expensive then it is. And it’s really sturdy too, not wobbly or anything, and no problems with the shelves bowing in the middle with the all the books I have on them. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: I Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shelves. I purchased this for my daughter’s 1st off campus apartment/bedroom. So easy to set up. Very sturdy. She could put a fan on the top shelf if she needs to. I bought some large canvas bins for the bottom 2 shelves for clothing & saved the top 2 shelves for loose girl stuff. I would definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan88

customer_reviews.title: So Easy!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little shorter than I expected, so make sure to look at the measurements. However, It is super easy to set up, just unfold the metal part and snap the shelves on. The color of the wood shelves is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Plant shelf
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. Easy to assemble. Looks great holding all my plants
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 of these now - they're great!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of these bookshelves now, and I really love them. They're super-easy to set up, since the frame folds up and open, and when you open them, you just sit the shelves on the bars that are designated for them. Not only that but they are sturdy. Both of mine have been filled with books, and while I tend to deliberately balance my books in a particular way so there isn't any risk of them falling over, these shelves handle the weight really well. One of my favorite purchases from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A. Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: was easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Bookshelf was delivered with one plastic clip partially broken, had scruffs on the shelves and frame, and multiple shelves had clips which were installed at an angle which made installing the shelves more difficult, and makes me question how long they will last. However the bookshelf itself feels fairly stable, looks decent, was easy to setup, and is fairly cheap. If the clips were installed properly and one of them wasn't broken, this would easily be 4 stars. So may have just received an unlucky order.
customer_reviews.author: jken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I wasn’t sure if this bookcase would fit my style. Now I know it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: bancory

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Not to big. Hold everything I need it too. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Fit and Very Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I have an indoor garden and wanted shelving to hold different sizes of pots. I did a lot of measuring to make sure it would fit into its space in my garage, and read the reviews to feel sure that it would be sturdy and stable so that my pots would be secure. I needn't have worried. The folding bookcase was easily moved into its space, opened without any problem, and stood securely. The pots have now been in place on the rack ever since, and I have been very happy with the folding bookcase's stability, since the pots stand very securely on the shelves. If I run out of room on this bookcase, I will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, easy to install, prompt shipping, good packaging on the shipment. Also, the product looks beautiful, and works brilliantly. The hassle free installation, sturdy built quality, well spaced shelves with ample room on them, make it a very a good purchase and excellent value for money. I have been stacking the shelves with comic books, hardback books, souvenirs etc. and so far the shelves haven't warped, buckled, sagged or deformed at all. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaushik S.

customer_reviews.title: Not like picture
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows the metal bars in the middle of each shelf, the bars are however right below the shelf. You cannot use this shelf for books, as the books can fall out the back.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bruggman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a few pieces of furniture on amazon. Honestly, the wood palettes are super heavy and sturdy! Super easy to put together you just line it up and set into place. It does come with hooks to screw onto the wall for extra sturdiness if you'd like which I thought was nice of them to send. I didn't as I didn't think it was necessary. I have some plants on mine and my dogs food and water and another storage cube, and it looks impossible to fall over. Packaging was great too! I'm not sure if this one is actually real wood or not because it feels heavy and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabina

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase in a Long Time!
customer_reviews.text: This little shelving unit really surprised me. It was super simple to assemble...took no time at all. It holds so many of my books, looks great and is much sturdier than I anticipated. It looks great in my office without taking up valuable space. It's so great, I've ordered a second one. I have a lot of books for school and personal pleasure and this shelving unit really fits everything perfectly and looks beautiful. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena A.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy assembly and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So happy I found this bookcase. I’ve mostly converted to ebooks, but still had a lot of books I wanted to keep that had been in boxes for a long time. Most bookcases I saw were too big for the space I had in my office and look to be difficult to put together. I was able to carry this though the house and had it set up in no time. Not sue why some reviewers had issues with the shelves my piped in with little effort. Seems very study and fits taller books I had no concerns loading all the shelves up. . Would recommend and purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to disassemble and reassemble
customer_reviews.text: Price was good and love the portability of it. I use it for craft fairs to display my products and it folds up and sets up so easily. The only complaint is that the wooden shelves are like a vinyl sticker and have peeled off in two corners, but it is towards the back so it is okay with me.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: I can live with it for now.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something inexpensive to go ahead and just get a few things off of the floor. I just moved into a new home, and haven't quite decided on any decor. When I saw these bookshelves, I thought they'd perfectly meet my needs for now and can ultimately be re-purposed or gifted away when I settled on the actual furniture I wanted in my space. They are not very tall and lean forward just a bit (on carpeted floors), but they work for now, and it's actually a good thing that they don't take up too much space. I definitely wouldn't put too much weight on them. Overall, I am pleased with the purchase of these units.
customer_reviews.author: BlueKitty406

customer_reviews.title: Easy, sturdy, functional
customer_reviews.text: Probably the easiest to assemble bookcase, and very study - I use it in my home office and it holds a LOT of stuff. While the wood shelving is a bit plastic, it still has a good visual appeal, and I like that the space between the shelving is high enough to hold binders and tall books.
customer_reviews.author: S. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: I wish Coavas made EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second item I purchased from COAVAS and I am so happy I found this brand! I purchased a desk as well. I adore this bookcase! I use it in my bedroom as a jewelry armoire/workout clothes storage and it is perfect. It takes only three minutes to assemble. It is the best thing ever..
customer_reviews.author: thecatsmeow74

customer_reviews.title: Easiest assembly ever
customer_reviews.text: Updated 1/9: Loved this so much I bought another one! Put together in 5 minutes again. I also love that it’s narrow enough to fit in small spaces. This bookcase is perfect for my home office. I had it put together in less than five minutes and could not be happier. I needed something narrow enough to fit in a specific place and hold a bunch of books. This fits the bill and I’m so happy. I’ll definitely order another soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Chung

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, quality and function exceptional for price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for son's room and think we will order another for home office. Easy assembly. I did not find it hard to snap together at all. I also think it would be great for a college dorm room or apartment. Easy to pack up and move. A very cool functional, quality bookcase for price. Not in least disappointed. Very impressed actually. I put it together in minutes. I'm a busy Mom and I did it all by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Judge

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my bookshelf arrived and the metal frame was bent. The shelves could not be clicked in because of this and I also think that the brackets on the shelves were not attached correctly since most of them were crooked. This made it impossible to assemble. Also the bookshelf was much shorter and smaller than I thought it would be, my fault since I didn't look at the measurements. Fortunately, I can return this and get a refund. Especially since I was looking for something a little bigger. Not sure if I can recommend this, it might be a great buy if yours does not come damaged.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, aesthetic bookshelves
customer_reviews.text: You will not regret this purchase. First off, it was the easiest assembly ever. It took me longer to get the pieces out the of the box, than it did to put together, just a simple snap in which was awesome. Additionally, I had read it wasn’t real wood, which didn’t shock me due to the price but I assumed it was the cheap composite wood. It’s not, it’s a plastic material that looks like wood which I think is genius! A lot more sturdy and scratch resistant which I love. I love everything about this bookshelves from the look, to the assembly, to the material. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: MISSING DESCRIPTION INFO - SHELVES COVERED WITH THIN VINYL LAMINATE
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE: I was surprised to discover that these shelves are covered with a THIN PLASTIC/VINYL LAMINATE. This thin laminate makes an otherwise solid sturdy folding bookshelf look cheap. The seller simply needs to include an actual DESCRIPTION of what the shelves are made of. OR use photos that allow buyer to actually SEE what the shelves look like online. Any bookshelf designed to be set up and taken down multiple times needs to be made of more durable material than this shelf material.
customer_reviews.author: arf1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, bit wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, from unpacking to assembly, took no more than 10 minutes. I like that it'll be easy to move due to the folding nature. Wish it was a tad bigger, it's definitely smaller in person than in picture, for that reason it's quite expensive at $89. No issues snapping in the shelves. The only negatives were that the metal frame was not level therefore making it wobbly. Had to use furniture pads to even it out. Also, the frame had scuff marks and the shelves weren't finished properly/ had damage on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookshelf! It's extremely sturdy and can hold quite a lot of weight which is awesome. It's also beautiful to look at if you like the industrial look. I found the shelves very easy to snap into place, but I'm a strong woman. If you're a bit weaker, you may want to use a padded mallet to hammer the shelves into place or ask someone for help. Once snapped into place, it isn't going to budge without some force. I'll eventually be getting more of these for my nano aquariums!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Not even feet and dangerous for children and pets
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble and the materials are super sturdy. However, it was not nicely put together. The the bottom is one side longer and one side shorter. No structures to stabilize it to water level nor keep it not moving. Tried to place it on different ground such as carpets or tiles. If you are trying to put it on a carpet surface please DO NOT PURCHASE, very dangerous and it may fall in any minute. Can’t return because it doesn’t support Kohl’s return. It is not worth my work to put everything in the box and bring it to UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Merrrrr G

customer_reviews.title: solid but possibly tippable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bookcase because the wooden ones i was use to buying had gone up to 119 From $99.It is easy to put together and will hold a lot of weight.the reason for the 4 star rating instead of 5 is that it is wobbly when you pull it forward.It could have used more weight in the back to keep it stable.wall screws came with the bookcase.I prefer the all wood bookcases i previously bought which were more stable
customer_reviews.author: Albert M. Kapustar

customer_reviews.title: Great. Buy it. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: Ok bad news first. It’s very slightly off balance. Two slips of cardboard have fixed this. But that’s an eyesore to a very OCD kind of person such as myself. Quality, assembly, delivery, everything else was fantastic. Totally worth the high price for what is a small-ish sized shelf. I also bought it to match my equally easy desk. (Same brand and series)
customer_reviews.author: Vidur Hans

customer_reviews.title: I am going to buy more ,,
customer_reviews.text: My goal was to put a few of my plants up high away from my new puppy. And I have to say that I’m really pleased with the product and the quality. Its shorter than I thought it would be, but who cares. It’s stylish and I’m happy with my purchase. Shipping took a lot longer than I expected not just due to the whole Covid situation. But the fact that they They lost one of my bookcases the first one came a lot sooner than the second. Other than that I definitely will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Itchy Foot

customer_reviews.title: Must buy if you're looking for something effortless.
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous shelves! I bought two of them and nothing I have ever bought has been easier to assemble. The frame has some sturdiness to it but is not heavy. It comes like a trifold and then you just snap the shelves in. I am in love with the aesthetic and convenience of these shelves. I am excited to see how they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for me
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money! I really dislike assembling things so this was perfect for me.... I am awaiting the desk that goes with it next week to go in my new office. I do agree with another reviewer said you do have to put a little “oomph” into snapping these in place so apparently I need to eat more Wheaties or increase my upper body strength. :). All in all, a great buy and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Britton

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I read a thousand reviews for folding bookcases. This one seemed very good. The reviews were very good, too. Then it went on sale. I purchased one. It arrived. I unpacked it and had the shelves snapped into place within two minutes. It is very sturdy. I needed it for 2-inch three ring binders. They slip onto the shelf perfectly. I was so happy with this shelf that I thought about buying another. Then they went on sale again. It took me five seconds to decide to buy another. The shelves look nice. They work well. I will buy another if they go on sale again!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest le Ennui

customer_reviews.title: Great, if not broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I already have one of these bookshelves and think it's terrific. I was looking forward to getting this matching shelf set up today, but unfortunately, this one came damaged. The zip tie holding one side panel was broken, and the weld on the hinge it was intended to help was broken, too. More zip ties and stronger welds might prevent this problem. I have reached out to Coavas through Amazon multiple times and also through direct email over the course of a couple weeks and haven't heard anything, so I'm just returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: HCL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces, and customization
customer_reviews.text: I love my shelves, and the matching desk. So easy for me to fold and move them. The desk is a little small for working on, but that also makes it perfect for small spaces. Also, I just remodeled my room, and the black metal was just wrong in the space, so I spray painted all the metal silver, and it looks awesome with the wood tops. I strongly suggest this product for anyone in small spaces or someone who likes to move furniture around. It also stores super easy because of the folding metal.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal/Easy
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something affordable and not complete junk (ie particle board book cases) and this did the trick. Came right to my house, unboxed and assembled it. Looks nice; its small but holds many books. Probably a little over priced but seems to be the best option around for affordable "not complete junk" book cases. I'm buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ilsa79

customer_reviews.title: Metal construction is good, but shelves have quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was really fast, but the wood textured shelving has some serious quality control issues. I mean, if you're going to save me time by pre-drilling in the rubber holds, at least do it correctly. Out of the 4 shelves included, only 1 fit correctly onto the metal frame - the others were spaced incorrectly and some were even tilted. I'll probably have to redrill half of the other rubber holds so the shelves actually clamp on properly, and I'm not even sure if that will work the way I want it. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Great replacement for my broken book shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than my prior book shelf which was broken during my recent move. This book shelf is easy to assemble. You don't need any tools. The wood is lighter than my other wood furniture but it's nice and fits nicely in my dining room. It fits more in apartments or bedrooms. It would highly recommend if you are someone who doesn't want to deal with having to assemble a piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: CN Nicholle

customer_reviews.title: Opens up a small space
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sturdy bookcase, goes perfectly with the desk from the same brand. Since it's not a solid, hunky piece of furniture, it's ideal for small apartments because it visually opens up the space. Be careful bringing the box inside. It's not heavy, but awkward, and I fell lugging it in and broke a rib. But I'm 67, so you will not likely have the same balance issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi in NC

customer_reviews.title: This is very sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the simplest to assemble bookcase I have seen. The frame unfolds, and then you snap the shelves into place. They fit securely, and the whole ensemble is very sturdy. I have put some heavy books on these shelves, and I see no flex or sag at all. It is also very stable on thick carpet, no wobble at all. While maybe slightly pricey for the components, this ease of assembly and solid construction is worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D. Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it’s beautiful. It was basically already assembled too. This would be great for a dorm, or someone Who moves often. I’m not on either of those situations though and I love it. It’s heavy enough to be sturdy, and it’s got a nice grown up industrial look without being clunky, because the bars are so thin and the shelves look like wood. It’s so cool. I’m very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: It was really easy to put together but one of the shelves came broken, the only option that was offered to me was to send it back but I couldn’t because the box came already damaged
customer_reviews.author: Morgane Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Best Bookshelf ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally received my bookshelf, I was a bit skeptical about it , I thought will come broken or smth but it came nicely packed , in very good condition. It doesn’t need any assembly, that’s what I was looking for ( have no man in the house to assemble things , so I gave it a try) , it took me 2 min literally to put it together. I love my bookshelf, it’s amazingly sturdy, very cozy, great color and it fits my room just perfect!!! Recommend it to everyone who wants a nice, cozy, sturdy , no headache assembly bookshelf or you can put anything you want on it!! Love love love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: mila

customer_reviews.title: Can I have another? :D Add in a matching chair, please???
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, simple, and easy :D We set this up in seconds. Just as easy as the matching desk. Highly recommend both! I really really want a matching chair that folds up just as easy! Please make this happen! I am seriously considering buying another of this bookcase. It handles my books, maps, and my cat jumping around on it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Quick Set Up/Looks Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bookshelf. I needed something in my bedroom to store books that are on my 'to read' list. These shelves are perfect! There is a bar at the back of each shelf that keeps the books from falling out the back. It was very easy to put together (once I figured out which way the shelves went). There are no tools required with the exception of a little bit of elbow grease to get the shelves to pop into place. I'm not strong by any means and had no trouble snapping the shelves into place. Literally took 15 minutes to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Zatezalo

customer_reviews.title: Small Sturdy Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shelf thinking it would be a full size shelf; however, it’s not! I was a little disappointed but it was my fault for not reading the measurements. I went based off of the picture and not the measurement descriptions. The shelf is cute and sturdy for small spaces and not very high-maybe half the size of a full size shelf.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Missing Fastener for Hinge. (updated: great customer service!)
customer_reviews.text: One of the two hinges was missing a fastener. Otherwise the shelf is very nicely built and the materials felt great. Edit: Received a message from them after this review, I got the shelf fixed already but they were helpful. I'm very happy with the product and hope to purchase these again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Yu

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but sturdy. A breeze to assemble. Roomy shelves.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to make an "office" space for my child for distance learning along with the desk from the same manufacturer. Looks nice and modern. Breeze to assemble. Unfold, pop in shelves, done. Beautiful and sturdy shelf ready for books and more. Hardware to screw into the wall as an anti-tipping mechanism is in the box as well.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to put together bookshelves!
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and I love them. My only complaint is that I live on the top floor of a garden apartment. The very heavy boxes were not brought up tp my apartment and just left them by the mailboxes. I’m in my 70’s and had no one to help me carry them up. So, I had to do it myself with enormous effort. This delivery issue prevents me from buying more of these fine shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bobby

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. If I could make changes I would make the shelves easier to snap on or make them a hinge type that just fold down. The shelves have a faux wood look, it looks like faux woodgrain contact paper, but they are sturdy. I prefer bookshelves that fold/unfold without being taken apart that are sturdy, that's why this product appealed to me. If you added more shelves to this product, that would be terrific! I use my bookshelf to store wide (2-3 inches in width) three ring binders and they fit very well. I have folding wooden bookshelves that hang over the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Richardson

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is the easiest piece of furniture I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is the easiest piece of furniture I have every put together. The metal part comes altogether and you literally just unfold it and snap the shelves into place. It looks way more expensive than it actually is and holds a decent amount of stuff. I use it in my kitchen because I have literally no cabinet space. It holds my glasses, dishes, utensils and a microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shelf! I bought it to put it games on. We know we will likely move it around the house so it is perfect. I love that it was so easy to put together. I love that it’ll fold up once the shelves are removed. I will be ordering more for my bookshop display area. It is sturdy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is packaged so securely that it took me longer to get it out of the box than it did to assemble it! :) It is extremely well made. Very sturdy. I do a lot of sewing/making quilts etc and I needed a place in my sewing room to arrange and keep all my sewing accessories etc. The shelves are nice and big and I also love the fact that you can leave one shelf out on any level if you need extra height for something! Super-easy to put together! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MJT

customer_reviews.title: The best flat-pack furniture experience I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: A shelf that assembles in 5 minutes, you say? Surely not. Yes. Yes it absolutely does! This is by far the simplest assembly I've ever encountered; this company needs to make more pieces like this because it's amazing and innovative. There are no tools required (no not even an "included allen wrench" or "well, you might need a hammer for tiny nails). Simply unfold the frame, press the shelves down to lock the clips onto the frame sides (careful to align them correctly before you apply pressure), and presto! You've got a new shelf.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the home office or craft room
customer_reviews.text: I needed shelving that was easy to assemble. I finally found this product. I’m happy to say it is sturdy, perfect height and fits in my small room without seemingly overly large in that small space. I bought two and will probably buy a couple more. It’s perfect for my little house.
customer_reviews.author: LisaBrashear

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought four of these bookcases and they are great; I expect to get one more. They come packaged carefully and are easy to assemble.. The frame folds out and the four shelves click into place easily. They are sturdy and hold a lot of books/weight. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: E. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Min assembly... good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Loved not having to “put together”!! Removed from box, unfolded frame, popped shelves into place... DONE. Actually bought another following that. The other was same however think came a slightly bent somewhere due to having to place something under one leg to keep sturdy. I have books and office things and feels very stable. I am happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: China

customer_reviews.title: Compact but very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for easy assembly and good quality. This is perfect. Not as large as I expected but holds all the books I needed it to. Assembly was easy but one of the shelves was slightly damaged, possibly while we were unpacking it. Doesn't impact the appearance or the function. Would certainly purchase again if I need more shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dorm life!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons dorm. There is quite literally no assembly— open box, folds open. The end. He has a zillion books. It’s very sturdy. Later in the year I bought him a DIY bookshelf (this wouldn’t work for the TV I got him) and was cursing every moment of assembly. I will definitely buy another one of these when he needs his next shelf and for my younger son when he goes off to school. GREAT product!!!
customer_reviews.author: April K Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: One Very Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing assembled and came nicely packaged so there was no damage to any of the parts. More importantly the set up took less than 5 minutes which I loved. The shelves feel thick and sturdy on the metal frame, definitely doesn’t feel cheep. There is a lot of space in between shelves too so lots of storage. I’ve very satisfied and will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Starr

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. We purchased this to have something easy to pack up for the next time we moved while also being functional. It was a little wobbly but heavy books on the bottom fixed that. The price point may be a little high for what it is but overall decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa P.

customer_reviews.title: This was Amazing Simple to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I am the first to admit I am not mechanically enclined. So when I found this product I was hoping for the best. I am glad to say that this shelf beat my expectations. It took me 5 minutes to put the shelves on. I think it took me longer to take the pieces out of the box than it took to assemble the shelf. I highly recommend this product for any non-carpenters such as myself.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lett

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful during assembly. The shelves add to the products ability to stand freely. Other than that, it's a very solid product and I expect it to stand up to a lifetime of use. No instructions were included but set up was intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly how described. I may order a second one! Easy Assembly . Fast delivery . If you are even thinking about it you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nettie40

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who have a hard time assembling things.
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and my son normally puts my furniture together but this bookcase was super easy. I felt like I had conquered My. Everest by myself. The feeling of not needing help is so good. My one piece of advice is to start with the top shelf first and work down to the bottom 😁
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new home and needed some easy bookshelfs. These are amazing, easy to assemble and sturdy. The instructions are kind of vague but once you figure which end is the bottom it's just plug and go. I really love the dimensions, it's perfect for narrow places.
customer_reviews.author: Zaighlor

customer_reviews.title: Easiest set up I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shelf with the easiest “assembly” I’ve ever had with a shelf or furniture. I used quotations because you don’t actually assemble anything as far as using a hex wrench or screws. You basically stand the side metal pieces up where you want it, snap the shelves into the metal pieces and Shazam, you got your shelf and you wonder why you didn’t buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Shortyguapo

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and super simple set up!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works perfectly in my living room and was super easy to set up! Thinking of getting another one for the other side of the room.
customer_reviews.author: CJ1234

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend !!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! The reviews do not lie. I don’t think I saw one bad review and I’m not surprised. This bookshelf is every thing I’ve ever wanted in a bookshelf. It’s sturdy, simple, stylish, not too big but it’s not too small either. I got the matching desk with it and I love that too! I’m a nursing student who lives in a small bedroom and I am so glad I bought this. It’s worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shelves to use in my trade shows. It was time to change the look of my booths and these shelves filled the bill. They are made well and easy to assemble. They are also easy to break down and to store until my next trade show. I give them 4 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A. DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how easy this was to set up! Sides swing open, shelves click into place and your done! AND it’s sturdy!! I bought it to organize my sons games and it is perfect... but it would be great to put anything on. I absolutely love this and have recommended this to friends as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzmarie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to buy it. It was easy to assemble. The boards click in with very firm pressure. I may end up moving this to my bathroom as my bathroom has horrible storage and I need something to put toiletry items on without it looking gaudy and out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Sallyd

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed. The bookcase is not sturdy at all. It wobbles and it’s due to poor craftsmanship. I’ve taken a video of what it looks like and will be asking for a replacement of better quality or disputing this charge.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and simple!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve actually had it in its box for a week cause I dread setting up furniture. But when I finally opened it today, I found out it was literally two steps! I was estactic, obviously! Took me 5 minutes to set up and it looks great. It’s stylish, yet simple. Would definitely purchase a second one!!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: NO COMPLAINTS. I love my book shelf. There was really no assembly. Once u unfold the actual book shelf out of the box. All is needed is to add the wooden boards & snap them in place. This was a great product invented for people like me. (Press for time). I will prefer this product to anyone. It’s the height of a 4 drawer file cabinet. The widget was a little bit wider than a 4 drawer file cabinet. Great for College Dorm rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This bookshelf arrived damaged and we only discovered this after we took the time to take it out of the box. It was heavy and we returned because it was damaged. We were disappointed as the bix wasn't damaged but the bookshelf was.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Easy-peasey. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My near 95-year-old mother needed a bookshelf, but there was no way I could order one and put it together myself. This collapsible bookshelf is amazing. Insto-presto. I easily pulled it out of the box, set it up, and snapped in the shelves. Within minutes, I was putting her items on it. And it looks great. Good value, good product idea.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Castro

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble.  Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three of these, and am planning on ordering one more. These shelves are easy to assemble, sturdy, and look great. Since the house we moved into did not have much kitchen storage space, and no pantry, they have helped us greatly with making the space we do have usable.
customer_reviews.author: Achee

customer_reviews.title: ease of assembly/disassembly
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it is compact, and should I ever end up between apartments & have to put my stuff in storage it's easy to break down and stores flat like a folding table that wont take up much room in a storage unit should it come to that
customer_reviews.author: William J. Lento Sr

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have a complaint about is( and this is mainly me not reading the description) about the height. I thought it’d be taller but as I said that was me not reading properly.
customer_reviews.author: Dgarciarosas89

customer_reviews.title: it is sturdy and would stand up if I had an outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Works perfectly for craft fairs. I have a problem with the shelves, the clamps line up on one side and about 1/2 inch off on the other from being able to clamp on. I am going to have my son look to see if we can move the clamps. Sometimes the shelves slam down as soon as I open it up to set it up. It is a little heavier that I expected but all in all, it is sturdy and would stand up if I had an outdoor craft fair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to get a bookshelf for the books crowding my desk. I must say, it was quick and easy to assemble. It’s pretty sturdy for the books I have, but I haven’t tried anything heavier on the top shelf. Placed some other items on it to see how it would hold. So far, so good! Will update as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Great for plants!
customer_reviews.text: I move around alot for work and wanted a bookshelf that can be easy transported as well. This was absolutely perfect for my needs! You can assemble the whole thing in seconds and it folds flat when you're ready to move. I'm currently using it as a shelf for my plants. I love this company and will be buying from them again!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Easiest piece of furniture I have ever set up. All that is needed is to "snap" in each shelf and voila! Looks nice, has enough space for my taller picture frames and cookbooks. Lightweight but sturdy. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynne Allaben

product_meta.title: Coavas Frosted Folding Bookshelf Home Office Industrial Bookcase No Assembly Storage Shelves Vintage 4 Tiers Flower Stand Rustic Metal Book Rack Organizer Frosted Black, 23.6 X 11.8 X 49.4 Inches
product_meta.description:
Color:Frosted Black

Product Basic Information of Vogue Carpenter 4-Tier industrial vintage Bookcase Shelve Organizer:

1. Color:Frosted Black Vintage Brown
2. Size: 23.6x11.6x49.2 Inch
3. Weight: 12.7 Kg
4. Material: MDF
5. Carton size: 54.5*27.8*3.7 Inch


Product Features of Vogue Carpenter 4-Tier industrial vintage Bookcase Shelve Organizer:
No-Assembly required: The shelves doesn’t require any assembly. After unfolding the main iron frame, clip the 4 shelves in their respective places and start using.
Multiple Usage: Ideal for the living room, the bed room, kids room, the kitchen. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor applications, at home or in the Office. 
Can be used for your plants as its design allows an easy maintenance of your plants and the back bars will function as a support while they grow.
Foldable: The Coavas rustic industrial Bookcase shelves is foldable which allows you to store it under the bed or in your closet while not using.


Package Includes:
* Carton
* Shelves
* Poly bag
feature_bullets: Best Gift Choice -- [ No Assembly ] Only 1 step, just open the black frame and snap the 4 Shelves on it,the entire process takes only 1 minute and does not require installation tools.
Industrial Bookshelf --[Folding] When not in use can be folded in the corner, save space.
Industrial Bookshelf -- [STURDY IRON FRAME] Sturdy black coated iron frame with two oblique side bars and extra back bars for a better stability and resistance.

Industrial Bookshelf - [MULTIPLE USAGE] – Ideal for the living room, the bed room, kids room, the kitchen, as outside storage for gardening tools or plants, can be also used in the office for storage and display.
Industrial Bookshelf -- [LARGE SHELF SPACES] The space between the shelves is 12Inch allowing a large storage area for your multiple items, books, family photos, frames, devices, utensils or plants.
